metadata.synopsis: Baneite Guard is mocking Manser about the death of his husband (an overseer forced him to beat his own husband to death).
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -1941; -2; 383start sneakingsneak towards the storage room (following the bloodstains)The AD will start

1.speaker: Fist of Bane Anouk
1.text: Your hand shakes, Gondian. Tell me, what was your friend's name?
1.context: NodeContext: cruel, knows why Manser is upset yet still pushing it

2.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
2.text: My husband's name was Lanpos, ma'am.
2.context: NodeContext: upset, trying to keep his voice steady

4.speaker: Fist of Bane Anouk
4.text: Lanpos deserved to die - tell me why.
4.context: NodeContext: rubbing salt in the wound

3.speaker: Gondian Manser Biggs
3.text: My husband was eavesdropping, ma'am. He - he needed to be beaten.
3.context: NodeContext: heratbreaking knowing he killed his own husband, barely keeping it together (for the sake of their kids)

0.speaker: Fist of Bane Anouk
0.context: NodeContext: cruel smile, delighting in his misery
